thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 2 of 105
thread.title: Colin Knell

author: Colin Knell
title: Colin Knell
text:
I have used OFX on numerous occasions and found he whole process to be easy, seamless and fast.
The rates were at market which was important to me as the amounts were large and I was already dealing with a conversion from AUD to USD.
I would recommend this over any bank initiated service as the banks are not a market and in some cases charge fees to do international transfers.
